full_summary:
# Advance Procurement Notice and Solicitation Information

## Project Information
* Job Title: Rehabilitation of 14 Wing Greenwood's Secondary Runway 12-30
* Location: Greenwood, Nova Scotia, Canada
* Purpose: The proposed project will involve the rehabilitation of the secondary runway and the replacement of the adjacent electrical/lighting system.

## Contract Information
* Contract Number: PW-23-01025275
* Solicitation Number: IE001858
* Date and Time of Closing: March 21, 2023, at 2:00 PM AST
* Estimated Value: $17,850,000.00

## Security Requirements
* Required Security Clearance: Basic Secret Clearance (BSN)
* Application Process: Interested contractors must submit a sponsorship request application to Defence Construction Canada's (DCC) Industrial Security Program (ISP) prior to the contract award.
* DCC's ISP will assist contractors in obtaining the required security clearance.

## Contact Information
* Project Manager: Reginald Stevens, P.Eng.
* Phone: 902-760-0323
* Email: [reginald.stevens@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:reginald.stevens@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)

## Disclaimer
DCC will not provide any assurance or guarantee regarding the success of the sponsorship request or the potential for security clearance. The applicant assumes all risks associated with the security clearance process.

Note:
This notice is for information purposes only and is not an invitation to bid. The Government reserves the right to amend or cancel this solicitation at any time. It is the responsibility of the contractor to ensure that they have the necessary security clearance and to follow the proper procedures for obtaining a security clearance.
